languages.text: "Когда в шпиле Опустошительной бури гнев обуял меня, ты сказал{mf||а}, что мой долг — мстить за товарищей, убивать ксеносов... И ты был{mf||а} прав{mf||а}. Не важно, один я или с братьями — долг мой неизменен".

"When rage overcame me in the Reaving Tempest's spire, you told me that it was my duty to avenge the fallen, to slay xenos... and you were right. Whether I am alone or with my brothers, my duty remains unchanged."
languages.original_text: "Когда в шпиле Опустошительной бури гнев обуял меня, ты сказал{mf||а}, что мой долг — мстить за товарищей, убивать ксеносов... И ты был{mf||а} прав{mf||а}. Не важно, один я или с братьями — долг мой неизменен".

traits.locale_text: "When rage overcame me in the Reaving Tempest's spire, you told me that it was my duty to avenge the fallen, to slay xenos... and you were right. Whether I am alone or with my brothers, my duty remains unchanged."

"When rage overcame me in the Reaving Tempest's spire, you told me that it was my duty to avenge the fallen, to slay xenos... and you were right. Whether I am alone or with my brothers, my duty remains unchanged."

"When rage overcame me in the Reaving Tempest's spire, you told me that it was my duty to avenge the fallen, to slay xenos... and you were right. Whether I am alone or with my brothers, my duty remains unchanged."

"When rage overcame me in the Reaving Tempest's spire, you told me that it was my duty to avenge the fallen, to slay xenos... and you were right. Whether I am alone or with my brothers, my duty remains unchanged."

languages.text: «Cuando la ira me abrumó en la torre de la Tempestad Asoladora, me recordó que era mi deber vengar a los caídos y matar xenos... Tenía razón. En solitario o con mis hermanos, mi deber sigue siendo el mismo».
languages.original_text: "When rage overcame me in the Reaving Tempest's spire, you told me that it was my duty to avenge the fallen, to slay xenos... and you were right. Whether I am alone or with my brothers, my duty remains unchanged."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando la ira me abrumó en la torre de la Tempestad Asoladora, me recordó que era mi deber vengar a los caídos y matar xenos... Tenía razón. En solitario o con mis hermanos, mi deber sigue siendo el mismo».

languages.text: “当我在狂风尖塔中被愤怒冲昏头脑时，是你告诉我，我的职责是为死去的兄弟们复仇，是将异形杀光……你说得对。无论是与我的兄弟们并肩作战，还是独自一人，我的职责都不会变。”
languages.original_text: "When rage overcame me in the Reaving Tempest's spire, you told me that it was my duty to avenge the fallen, to slay xenos... and you were right. Whether I am alone or with my brothers, my duty remains unchanged."

traits.locale_text: “当我在狂风尖塔中被愤怒冲昏头脑时，是你告诉我，我的职责是为死去的兄弟们复仇，是将异形杀光……你说得对。无论是与我的兄弟们并肩作战，还是独自一人，我的职责都不会变。”

languages.text: 「リーヴィング・テンペストの尖頭で俺が怒りに我を忘れたとき、あんたは俺に、堕ちたる者に復讐し、異種族を殺すのが俺の果たすべき義務だと言った…あんたは正しかった。兄弟と一緒だろうが、俺ひとりだろうが、その義務は変わらない」
languages.original_text: "When rage overcame me in the Reaving Tempest's spire, you told me that it was my duty to avenge the fallen, to slay xenos... and you were right. Whether I am alone or with my brothers, my duty remains unchanged."

traits.locale_text: 「リーヴィング・テンペストの尖頭で俺が怒りに我を忘れたとき、あんたは俺に、堕ちたる者に復讐し、異種族を殺すのが俺の果たすべき義務だと言った…あんたは正しかった。兄弟と一緒だろうが、俺ひとりだろうが、その義務は変わらない」

languages.text: « Quand la colère m'a submergé dans la flèche de la Tempête ravageuse, vous m'avez dit que je devais venger mes frères défunts en tuant des xénos... et vous aviez raison. Que je sois seul ou avec ma meute, mon devoir reste inchangé. »
languages.original_text: "When rage overcame me in the Reaving Tempest's spire, you told me that it was my duty to avenge the fallen, to slay xenos... and you were right. Whether I am alone or with my brothers, my duty remains unchanged."

traits.locale_text: « Quand la colère m'a submergé dans la flèche de la Tempête ravageuse, vous m'avez dit que je devais venger mes frères défunts en tuant des xénos... et vous aviez raison. Que je sois seul ou avec ma meute, mon devoir reste inchangé. »

languages.text: "Als mich im Turm des plündernden Sturms die Wut überkam, habt Ihr mir gesagt, dass es meine Pflicht sei, die Gefallenen zu rächen, Xenos zu töten ... und Ihr hattet recht. Ob ich allein oder mit meinen Brüdern bin, meine Pflicht bleibt die gleiche."
languages.original_text: "When rage overcame me in the Reaving Tempest's spire, you told me that it was my duty to avenge the fallen, to slay xenos... and you were right. Whether I am alone or with my brothers, my duty remains unchanged."

traits.locale_text: "Als mich im Turm des plündernden Sturms die Wut überkam, habt Ihr mir gesagt, dass es meine Pflicht sei, die Gefallenen zu rächen, Xenos zu töten ... und Ihr hattet recht. Ob ich allein oder mit meinen Brüdern bin, meine Pflicht bleibt die gleiche."

languages.original_text: "When rage overcame me in the Reaving Tempest's spire, you told me that it was my duty to avenge the fallen, to slay xenos... and you were right. Whether I am alone or with my brothers, my duty remains unchanged."

languages.text: "Müfteris Kasırga kulesinde öfke, bedenimi ele geçirdi. Sen bana düşen kardeşlerimin intikamını almanın görevim olduğunu, zenoları katletmem gerektiğini söylemiştin. Haklıydın da. İster tek başıma ister kardeşlerimle olsun, görevim hiç değişmedi."
languages.original_text: "When rage overcame me in the Reaving Tempest's spire, you told me that it was my duty to avenge the fallen, to slay xenos... and you were right. Whether I am alone or with my brothers, my duty remains unchanged."

traits.locale_text: "Müfteris Kasırga kulesinde öfke bedenimi ele geçirdi. Sen bana düşen kardeşlerimin intikamını almanın görevim olduğunu, zenoları katletmem gerektiğini söylemiştin. Haklıydın da. İster tek başıma ister kardeşlerimle olsun, görevim hiç değişmedi."
